moves.1. e4 c5 2. d4 g6 3. Nf3 Bg7: the Hungarian variation of the Sicilian: I will stick to this, until I die...
moves.5. c3: this is surely not the best for White: still haven't figured out what is; I rarely get to play this variation with White...
moves.7. O-O Ne7 8. Be3: it has to come at some point...
moves.8... Qc7 9. Qd2: preparing Bh6: always a dead end...
moves.11. Bxg7 Kxg7 12. c4: not very impressing: but also White knows, that d7-d5 is the issue here...
moves.14. exd5: the exchange is forced: otherwise dxc4, or even d5-d4...
moves.18... Rc5: this time, the pin is costly...
moves.19. Qd3: and after this, the pin becomes lethal...
moves.19... Nb4: and Black resigns: the clock remained at 4:31 for Black, and 2:34 for White; in minutes, that is...
